meanings.definition: A substance used to treat syphilis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antisyphilitics to cure the infection.
meanings.sent2: Antisyphilitics are essential in fighting against syphilis.
meanings.sent3: The antisyphilitics danced around happily, knowing they were defeating the disease.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like antisyphilitics, eradicating the lies that plagued their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The antisyphilitics worked tirelessly like tiny soldiers battling the invading bacteria.

meanings.sent4: Her determination was like antisyphilitics, aggressively attacking the disease of self-doubt.
meanings.sent5: The antisyphilitics marched into the bloodstream, ready to battle the syphilis bacteria.
